wikitext.*:
'''HAN''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "add to, increase, enhance, honour (espec. by gift)".<ref name=VT43>{{VT|43a}} p. 14 (root appearing as "√han")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]] ''han'' ("beyond")<ref name=VT43/>

Other possible derivatives are Quenya ''[[hantalë]]'' and *''[[Hantalë#Etymology|hanta-]]''.<ref name=VT43/>

{{references}}
